title: Google Assistant ends Notes support for third parties, paving the way for other AIs
description: Google continues its current plan of shutting down third-party support, casting a shadow over Assistant's future.

title: There's a new Gmail verification scam; here's how to avoid getting caught up in it
description: Bad actors have been discovered exploiting a Gmail bug in order impersonate verified accounts in new phishing scam.

title: Amazon may give Prime customers a cheaper monthly cellular plan
description: Amazon may be negotiating with carriers to offer MVNO service to Amazon Prime members for a low monthly fee

title: Google Wallet's latest update lets you save more than just your money
description: Google introduces several new features like the ability to store boarding passes and the official launch of digital ID cards.

title: Apple iTunes has a serious security flaw you really should know about
description: Hackers could use iTunes to create a system folder with high privileges, so make sure to patch up.

title: Samsung promises a fix for blurry photos from Galaxy S23 and S23 Plus cameras
description: Samsung’s much better camera on the Galaxy S23 comes with its own trade-offs.

title: Another new Sonic Lego set features the iconic Death Egg robot
description: A fifth Sonic Lego set has been revealed for 2023, featuring Dr. Eggman's iconic Death Egg robot boss.

title: These incredible Father’s Day gifts will really make Dad’s day
description: Forget slippers and ties: think coffee, Kindles, smartphones and speakers

title: MOVEit Transfer has a major security issue - here's what you need to know
description: Hackers abused a zero-day in MOVEit Transfer to move countless sensitive files, experts claim.

title: US government legal firm Casepoint investigating data breach
description: ALPHV apparently managed to steal terabytes of sensitive data, including some belonging to the US government.

title: Nvidia's latest AI model could revolutionize games development
description: Nvidia Research unveils Neuralangelo - an AI model capable of turning 2D videos shot on smartphones into vivid 3D reconstructions.

title: Microsoft Teams on Windows 11 is getting a major facelift, and I'm excited
description: Microsoft is revamping Teams communities and giving the platform a Discord-like facelift.

title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 5 and Flip 5 global launch likely to be held in South Korea
description: During a media briefing, Samsung appears to have confirmed that its next Galaxy Unpacked event will take place in Seoul, South Korea.

title: 7 new movies and TV shows on Netflix, Max, Prime Video and more this weekend (June 2)
description: From divisive new dramas to returning sci-fi favorites, these are the films and TV series to stream this weekend.

title: New Nintendo Switch Joy-Con controllers come in pleasing pastel colors
description: Two new sets of Nintendo Switch Joy-Con controllers feature some cool pastel colorways.

title: Google will now pay you some serious dough to find security flaws in Chrome
description: Life-changing sums of money are being offered by Google to find some of the worst-offending vulnerabilities in Chrome.

title: Senegal restricts internet access amid protests over the arrest of opposition leader
description: Guinea, Mauritania, and now Senegal: citizens turn to VPN services to keep accessing social media since May 17. Why is the internet in West Africa going dark?

title: Microsoft wants to help Mac users actually enjoy using Windows
description: Microsoft is giving Mac users an online space to share their experiences, tips, and tricks and about using its products.

title: Microsoft gives one of its oldest apps dark mode in Windows 11
description: Love the Paint app? You’ll be impressed with Microsoft’s latest changes.

title: Netflix Tudum: 33 TV shows and movies to look out for at the June 17 showcase
description: Top TV shows like Squid Game and Stranger Things are expected to appear at Netflix's huge fan event, which is just days away.

title: End of an Era: Apple plans to kill off original 12-inch MacBook
description: Apple has officially tossed the 12-inch Macbook in the bin. RIP.

title: Windows 11 gets ability to view phone photos... just as Apple cans a similar feature for Macs
description: Microsoft has added a nifty feature to view photos from your phone’s camera roll right in File Explorer.

title: Microsoft is finally making Edge a much more secure place to surf the web
description: Enhanced security tools will be switched on by default in Microsoft Edge.

title: Evercade apologizes for AI art blunder
description: Evercade creator Blaze Entertainment has issued an apology after commissioning AI-generated artwork.

title: WordPress launches paid and premium newsletters
description: Premium WordPress content can now be shared in its own newsletter designed just for paying customers and fans.

title: Russia blames US and Apple for hacking diplomat iPhones
description: Russian government and Kaspersky uncover cases of advanced spyware infecting iOS devices.

title: The Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra might not get this exciting camera upgrade after all
description: The Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra reportedly won't get a variable zoom lens, or many other camera improvements.

title: Redfall developers were secretly hoping that Microsoft would cancel it
description: A recent report has revealed that some of Arkane's longest-serving developers were hoping that Redfall would be canned.

title: Stalker 2 devs claim Russian hackers are leaking the game's test builds
description: GSC Game World, the devs of Stalker 2, has claimed that Russian hackers are leaking test builds of the game.

title: Faster SSDs are finally coming, but your motherboard might not be ready
description: PCIe 5.0 SSDs are faster than anything else on the consumer market, but you're going to need to rethink your case setup if you want to use the very best.

title: Diablo 4 players on PS5 are having a hard time logging in
description: Diablo 4 players on PS5 are running into an error that prevents them logging in, during what is otherwise a smooth launch.

title: Star Wars Jedi: Suvivor’s joke boss is surprisingly lethal, according to new stats
description: According to EA’s latest stats, Star Wars Jedi: Survivor’s joke boss has been racking up quite the body count.

title: Now Meta is forcing all its employees back to the office
description: Having slimmed the company down by tens of thousands, Meta is now asking remaining employees to head into the office once again.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Friday, June 2 (game #494)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.
